title: Wanted – 12 Low Grade Commons & HOF Cards To Finish My Set Of 520
author: rommesc

posts.post_title: Wanted – 12 Low Grade Commons & HOF Cards To Finish My Set Of 520
posts.post_content:
Looking for 12 cards to complete my set of 520.  Willing to purchase or trade and have many duplicates to offer.  Prefer raw over graded.  Thanks in advance!

Armbuster, Portrait(Polar Bear)
Cobb, Green Portrait
Cobb, Red Portrait(Polar Bear)
Grimshaw(Polar Bear)
Jordan, Batting(Polar Bear)
Kelley, Batting(Polar Bear)
Lajoie, Throwing
McGraw, Glove at Hip(Polar Bear)
Overall, Hands at Waist(Polar Bear)
Stanage, Fielding(Polar Bear)
Taylor, Ready to Throw(Polar Bear)
Tinker, Hands on Knees

I have a low grade polar bear Moran portrait.  
Interested?  
Trade? Or cash?  
Thx,
Cory
A big thank you to Doug, Scott, Jeff, Luke, and Paul for the smooth transactions!  Still looking for 24 more cards to finish my set...
Wanted list updated and still have many cards available for trade.
